definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: One hot steak on a sizzlin' platter.
sentences.chinese: 一份熱牛排，還在盤子裏噝噝作響呢。

sentences.english: I have a coupon for five dollars off a steak dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我有一張點牛排可以少五元的折價券。

sentences.english: I plan to absorb water celery soup and beef cutlet.
sentences.chinese: 我打算喫水芹菜湯和牛排。

sentences.english: Soup, and then steak to follow, please.
Southern fried chicken , T-bone steak and Lobster Newburg .
sentences.chinese: 南方炸雞，T骨牛排，牛堡龍蝦。

sentences.english: Yes, I'll have a mixed Salad and a Sirloin Steak.
sentences.chinese: 我要一份綜合沙拉和一客沙朗牛排。

sentences.english: Prepare your filet mignon with advice from a full-time cook in this free video on steak.
sentences.chinese: 準備你的意見菲力從這個免費視頻全職煮牛排。

sentences.english: He wanted a little more pepper to spice up his rump steak.
sentences.chinese: 他想再加一點胡椒粉給他的菲力牛排調味。

sentences.english: JAF and friends concluded that the steak was the best among all that we had eaten.
sentences.chinese: 我們一致認爲牛排是這一頓當中最好喫的了。

sentences.english: Bill: "If you had the chance to pick first, which one would you pick?"
sentences.chinese: 如果你先拿，你會挑哪一份牛排呢？

sentences.english: It's on your left. It's next to the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 威克牛排酒家在你的左手邊，緊挨着停車場。

sentences.english: Porterhouse steak is so expensive, because it's considered a fine cut of beef.
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排很貴，因爲它是牛身上最好的一塊肉。

sentences.english: This tender, juicy steak really hits the ot.
sentences.chinese: 這片多汁香嫩的牛排真是來得正是時候。

sentences.english: My steak is too rare. Can you take it back and cook it longer?
sentences.chinese: 我的牛排太生了，請拿回再烤一會好嗎？

sentences.english: It's a steakhouse and it's on Camden, I believe.
sentences.chinese: 那是賣牛排的餐館，在卡姆登，我想是。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, sir, but we're all out of the veal cutlet.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，先生，我們的小牛排賣光了。

definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
